author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description: Forward port of #39975
Following the addition of a new Era (`Run3_pp_on_PbPb_approxSiStripClusters`) in #39863, this PR updates the Era in the online DQM clients that use tracking in order to properly cope with the `approxSiStripClusters`. Detailed description of the changes in the 12_5_X PR: #39975 #### PR validation: 12_5_X backport to be tested in P5 #### Backport: Not a backport
title: Use Era Run3_pp_on_PbPb_approxSiStripClusters in DQM clients with tracking
